alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 7:12PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong outflow boundary will impact portions of northern Johnson County through 745 PM MDT... At 710 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong outflow boundary 9 miles northwest of Saddlestring, or 17 miles south of Sheridan, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong outflow will be near... Saddlestring and Fort Phil Kearny Historical Site around 720 PM MDT. Lake De Smet around 725 PM MDT. Buffalo around 730 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between mile markers 279 and 299. Interstate 90 between mile markers 42 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
